complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Next.js 15 and React 19 Upgrade
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the major framework upgrade into migration planning, dependency updates, Server Components implementation, route migration, performance optimization, and comprehensive testing phases.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity major version upgrade affecting entire application architecture with potential breaking changes and new paradigms to implement.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: AWS CDK v2 Infrastructure Upgrade
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Structure the infrastructure upgrade into CDK migration, security configuration, monitoring setup, database design, Lambda implementation, networking configuration, deployment automation, and testing procedures.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Very high complexity involving complete infrastructure overhaul with multiple AWS services, security considerations, and production deployment requirements.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Launch Preparation and Quality Assurance
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Structure launch preparation into load testing, security auditing, accessibility validation, performance verification, content review, backup testing, and deployment procedures.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity involving comprehensive pre-launch validation, multiple testing phases, and critical deployment preparation with rollback procedures.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Form Validation System Overhaul
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Decompose the validation system overhaul into: (1) Client-side validation with React Hook Form/Zod, (2) Server-side validation logic, (3) Schema design and edge case handling, (4) Accessibility/error messaging, (5) Rate limiting with Upstash Redis, (6) Input sanitization, (7) Security testing (XSS/CSRF), (8) Integration and regression testing.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This is a foundational system rebuild with high security, validation, and accessibility requirements. It spans both client and server, introduces rate limiting and sanitization, and must be robust against edge cases, making it highly complex and in need of granular subtasks.[3][4][5]

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Performance Optimization and Core Web Vitals
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down performance optimization into: (1) Core Web Vitals measurement, (2) Next.js image optimization, (3) Code splitting and bundle analysis, (4) Caching strategies, (5) Lazy loading and preloading, (6) Lighthouse CI setup, (7) Cross-device/network testing, (8) Regression and budget validation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Achieving top performance scores across all metrics, devices, and networks involves deep architectural changes, advanced optimization, and rigorous testing, making this a highly complex task.[3][4][5]

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Security Implementation and Compliance
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand security and compliance into: (1) Security header configuration, (2) WAF and rate limiting, (3) DDoS protection, (4) GDPR/cookie consent, (5) Input sanitization/XSS/CSRF, (6) Authentication setup, (7) Automated security scanning, (8) Vulnerability monitoring, (9) Compliance documentation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task covers enterprise-grade security, compliance, and monitoring, each with high risk and technical depth. It requires a comprehensive, multi-layered approach, making it the most complex in the set.[3][4][5]

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Emergency Contact Form Repair (P0 Critical)
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the contact form repair into subtasks covering form state debugging, React Hook Form v8 integration, Zod v4 schema validation, honeypot and GDPR compliance, button enablement logic, email service (Resend API) testing, error handling, and cross-browser validation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task is highly complex due to its critical business impact, the need for strict validation, integration with external services, and comprehensive testing across browsers. It involves both frontend and backend logic, security, and compliance requirements.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Mobile Navigation Emergency Fix (P0 Critical)
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand the mobile navigation fix into subtasks for event handler debugging, state management review, CSS/z-index adjustments, cross-browser mobile testing, touch interaction validation, responsive layout checks, and regression testing.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: The task is urgent and affects a large user base, requiring deep debugging across multiple layers (JS, CSS, event handling) and thorough device/browser testing.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Tailwind CSS v4 Design System Implementation
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Decompose the design system implementation into subtasks for Tailwind v4 setup, design tokens, glassmorphism components, theme switching, CSS-in-JS integration, spacing/typography scale, animation system, component variants, and accessibility validation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This is a broad, multi-faceted task involving architecture, design, theming, and accessibility, each requiring specialized attention and testing.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: OpenAI GPT-4o Integration for AI-Enhanced Content
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the AI integration into subtasks for API integration, content template creation, caching setup, fallback logic, lead scoring, prompt engineering, rate limiting, and quality testing.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Integrating advanced AI models with robust error handling, caching, and business logic introduces significant complexity and requires careful modularization.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Advanced Analytics and Monitoring System
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand analytics implementation into subtasks for Vercel Analytics integration, custom DynamoDB storage, real-time tracking, Core Web Vitals monitoring, funnel analysis, GDPR compliance, dashboard UI, data validation, automated reporting, and security/privacy testing.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task spans multiple systems (analytics, storage, dashboards, compliance), each with its own complexity and integration challenges.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Interactive Project Portfolio with AI Insights
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Decompose the portfolio into subtasks for project card UI, filtering/search, case study pages, tech stack visualization, AI insights integration, live demo embedding, GitHub linking, and interactive diagrams.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Combines advanced UI/UX, AI integration, and interactive features, requiring both frontend and backend coordination.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: AI-Powered Lead Qualification System
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand lead qualification into subtasks for smart form UI, AI scoring logic, requirement matching, budget/timeline assessment, lead routing, calendar integration, notification system, follow-up automation, and compliance validation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Complex due to AI-driven logic, integrations (calendar, notifications), automation, and compliance, all requiring robust coordination.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down mobile-first enhancement into subtasks for responsive layout, touch interaction, progressive enhancement, font optimization, navigation patterns, swipe gesture support, and accessibility testing.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down post-launch optimization into subtasks for performance tracking, user behavior analytics, conversion optimization, A/B testing, feedback collection, review processes, and success metrics tracking.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Focused on continuous improvement, involving analytics, user feedback, and process automation.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Client-Side Form Validation with React Hook Form and Zod
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand client-side validation into subtasks for schema design, field validation, real-time feedback, error messaging, conditional logic, file upload validation, honeypot integration, and accessibility testing.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Complex validation logic, accessibility, and security features require careful breakdown for robust implementation.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Server-Side Form Validation and Security Implementation
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Decompose server-side validation into subtasks for Zod schema validation, rate limiting, input sanitization, CSRF protection, XSS prevention, honeypot validation, logging, security headers, request size limits, and security audits.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Next.js 15 and React 19 Framework Upgrade with TypeScript 5.8.4 Migration
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the framework upgrade into subtasks for pnpm migration, Next.js upgrade, React upgrade, TypeScript migration, dependency updates, feature adoption, CI/CD update, breaking change fixes, compatibility testing, and documentation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Major framework upgrades are inherently risky and complex, requiring careful planning, testing, and documentation.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: App Router Migration with Server Components Conversion
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand router migration into subtasks for app directory setup, Server/Client component conversion, layout hierarchy, API route migration, data fetching updates, metadata API, dynamic routing, Suspense/streaming, TypeScript integration, and navigation testing.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Involves architectural changes, new patterns, and migration of existing logic, all of which are high-risk and require granular subtasks.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: React 19 Performance Features Implementation with Core Web Vitals Optimization
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Decompose performance optimization into subtasks for concurrent feature adoption, caching strategies, SSR streaming, Core Web Vitals tuning, Lighthouse CI setup, performance budgets, real-time monitoring, optimization techniques, dashboard creation, and regression testing.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Advanced performance work with new React features and deep integration/testing across the stack makes this highly complex.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down VPC setup into subtasks for CDK project setup, VPC creation, subnet configuration, security groups, NAT gateways, route tables, VPC endpoints, flow logs, and DNS configuration.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Cloud networking is complex, with many interdependent components and security considerations.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: CloudFront CDN and Route 53 DNS Configuration with SSL/TLS and Global Content Delivery
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand CDN/DNS setup into subtasks for CloudFront distribution, origin configuration, Route 53 setup, SSL/TLS certificate management, caching policies, CloudFront Functions, error pages, compression, and security integration.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Involves multiple AWS services, security, and performance tuning, each with its own setup and validation steps.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: DynamoDB and S3 Storage Setup with Redis Caching Layer
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Decompose storage setup into subtasks for DynamoDB table design, S3 bucket setup, Redis cluster deployment, data modeling, access policies, backup/replication, monitoring, error handling, and cost optimization.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Multi-service storage architecture with data modeling, security, and operational requirements.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: AWS Lambda Functions and API Gateway Setup for Serverless Architecture
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down serverless setup into subtasks for Lambda function creation, API Gateway configuration, route handlers, error handling, input validation, shared layers, environment variables, IAM roles, monitoring, and performance optimization.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Serverless architecture with multiple integrations, security, and performance considerations is highly complex.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Enterprise Security Headers and WAF Implementation
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand security implementation into subtasks for WAF setup, CSP headers, HTTP security headers, DDoS protection, GDPR compliance, automated scanning, security monitoring, incident response, rate limiting, and SSL/TLS configuration.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Enterprise security requires multi-layered protection, compliance, automation, and monitoring, each with significant depth.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: CloudWatch Monitoring, CI/CD Pipelines, and Blue-Green Deployment Automation
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Decompose monitoring and deployment into subtasks for CloudWatch dashboards, log aggregation, alarm setup, CI/CD pipeline configuration, blue-green deployment, rollback automation, infrastructure monitoring, scaling policies, cross-region setup, and backup verification.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Combines observability, automation, and deployment strategies, each with critical operational impact and technical depth.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Comprehensive Testing Suite Implementation with Vitest, Playwright E2E Testing, Storybook Component Testing, and CI/CD Integration
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand testing suite into subtasks for Vitest/unit tests, Playwright/E2E, Storybook/component tests, API mocking, coverage reporting, visual regression, accessibility, CI/CD integration, test utilities, and environment setup.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Full-spectrum testing across multiple tools and environments, with automation and coverage requirements, is highly complex.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Pre-launch Security and Performance Auditing with Automated Penetration Testing, Performance Validation, and Comprehensive Audit Reporting
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down pre-launch auditing into subtasks for penetration testing, vulnerability scanning, SSL analysis, dependency scanning, performance auditing, Core Web Vitals validation, security pipeline setup, audit reporting, compliance validation, load testing, alerting, and documentation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This is the most complex task, requiring coordination of security, performance, compliance, automation, and reporting, all under strict pre-launch deadlines.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Accessibility Validation and Content Review with WCAG 2.1 AA Compliance Testing
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand accessibility validation into subtasks for automated WCAG testing, screen reader validation, keyboard navigation, color contrast checks, content readability review, alt text/captions, ARIA/semantic markup, accessibility checklist, user testing, and monitoring setup.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Comprehensive accessibility requires both automated and manual testing, content review, and ongoing monitoring, each with specialized requirements.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Final Load Testing and Production Deployment Procedures with Blue-Green Deployment Validation
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Decompose final deployment into subtasks for load testing setup, scenario scripting, blue-green deployment, health checks, canary validation, rollback procedures, readiness checklist, SSL/DNS validation, WAF verification, monitoring setup, disaster recovery testing, and deployment documentation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Final deployment is the culmination of all prior work, requiring exhaustive testing, validation, automation, and documentation to ensure production readiness and rapid recovery.
